title: Pre-Service Teacher Education Course Design Incorporating Generative AI

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Current practitioner with entry-level expertise in social studies and access to digitally supported environments

learning_goals: Capable of applying three or more generative AI-based instructional design frameworks

Learners develop three types of creative instructional materials for vocational training institutions using AI tools (e.g., Canva, ChatGPT) and write reports meeting critical evaluation criteria (average ≥4/5 scale) in peer reviews and expert assessments.
Design and implementation of AI-assisted problem-solving projects integrated with metacognitive strategies

Learners design three or more engagement strategies (e.g., quizzes, gamification, personalized feedback) using AI-driven personalized recommendation systems (e.g., ChatGPT, learning analytics tools) on a microlearning platform and create a four-week execution plan to improve learner engagement (login frequency, content completion rates) by over 20%.

resources: Generative AI Platform Accounts (ChatGPT, Gemini, etc.)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
